channel.title: WDF cant rc on dodian source?!
channel.description:
added a nature alter, then added all the stuff so when you clcik u get xp and nat rune.
i compile, no errors.
and nothing happens when i clcik the object :(
please help anyone!

item.title: WDF cant rc on dodian source?!
item.dc:creator: @tedyslilnoob tedyslilnoob
item.description:
@tedyslilnoob wrote:

XD, its pretty cool, but its slow clicking each one individually, i’d like it so you clcik the talisman and use on 1 ess and it replaces all the ess you have with bloods, but im a n33b

rc skill is nuber 7 right?

also, how do i make you need a 1 nat to do this spell:

[code]else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch fixed by Mod Adam
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 55)
{

{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3);
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((115*playerLevel[6]), 6);
setAnimation(712);
playerGfx(113, 0);

deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 10);
deleteItem(554,getItemSlot(554), 5);
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 55)
{
sendMessage(“You need at least 55 Magic to cast High Level Alchemy”);
}
}[/code]
